metadata.title: CVE-2022-48337 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: GNU Emacs through 28.2 allows attackers to execute commands via shellmetacharacters in the name of a source-code file, because lib-src/etags.cuses the system C library function in its implementation of the etagsprogram. For example, a victim may use the "etags -u *" command (suggestedin the etags documentation) in a situation where the current workingdirectory has contents that depend on untrusted input.

criterions.comment: emacs package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
xemacs21 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
xemacs21-packages package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
